message: I've been pretty lax on finding new bands lately. Anyone got some good recommendations?  Specifically within the synthpop genre, anyway.
The Asteroids Galaxy Tour, The Yeah Yeah Yeahs, and Deerhoof are just a few.  Tons of artists in that space.
Covenant's new "Modern Ruin" album is decent, though none of the tracks besides "Lightbringer" have stood out yet.
